SUE: I just have to mention... a small scheduling issue.
HARVEY: Listen to me very carefully `cause I don't think you've heard me.
HARVEY: I WANT YOU for this show. So we'll organize around whatever mother, brother, fucking sick dog or rabbit you need to take care of.

HARVEY: That's why we've decided we want you to host... THE NEW YEAR'S EVE
HARVEY: ...network's biggest show! 50 million viewers... LIVE. You can't get any higher ...
SUE: I've got some amazing news... We are doing the cover of Vogue!

HARVEY: Ratings are through the roof.
HARVEY: That's phe-no-me-nal. We've never seen such figures in all the network's history! PEOPLE LOVE YOU!
HARVEY: Let me introduce you to the shareholders! They've been dying to meet you!
